value:
My brother is very skilled. Nobody
can beat him—not even me. And he
never makes mistakes.

You could say that my brother Lloyd
and I are well known, at least to those
who travel in certain circles...$k$pWe're the Reed brothers of the Black
Fang.

Show me your weapon.$k$pWhat is this thing? Don't tell me you
use it to fight!

Places like this... So pretty, so proper...
They just aren't for me. Give me a
target! I need something to do.

It's not that I enjoy violence... But I
have to uphold our code. Dispensing
the Fang's justice is my job.

Bring me $Nu!
I've come with greetings. That's
right—the Mad Dog is here in person!

Now everyone will know what the
Mad Dog is capable of!

Nowhere near good enough—not
yet!
Is this a joke? It's a bad one.

More strength to take care of
the Fang's business...

I'm Linus, the one and only Mad Dog
of the Four Fangs! I'm ready to go—
show me the filth, and I'll deal with it.

I'm fighting at my peak, day after day.
I was on edge when I first got here,
but you've put me at ease.$k$pYou make a good leader.$k$pI'm stronger than just about anyone,
but I'm not a deep thinker. I leave that
to my brother and my father.$k$pI can be impulsive, and it's gotten me
into trouble, I'll admit.$k$pBut I can tell that you're sharp, and
your heart is in the right place, too.$k$pI've seen the worst of humanity, and
you're one of the good ones. Believe
me—I know.$k$pThat's why I trust you, and why I
fight just as hard for you as I do
for my brother.$k$pEnough talk. Where's our next
target? I promise to bring down the
Fang's justice on them!
おらぁっ！
くらえよっ！
うああっ！
…んだと…！？
I will crush you myself!
You cannot escape the Fangs.
Will you stop yammering!
Repent your sins!
Brother... I'm sorry...
Haha
Hey. You sure seem to keep busy.
So you want a fight? Then a fight you'll get!
We are the Black Fang! You do not insult my family!
Within the Fangs, I'm known as the Mad Dog.
When my brother and I get together, nobody can stop us. Nobody.
Neither my father nor my brother make mistakes.
I can't figure you out. All I'm sure of is you're not one of the bad guys.
Fang justice!
We're going hunting!
